steps.name: Given I open Mars Airline home page
When I search flight with "July", "December (two years from now)" and "BC1-HGY-966"
Select item 'December (two years from now)' in 'Returning' dropdown element
select December (two years from now), {force: false}
page load --waiting for new page to load--
Then I should see "Seats available!" message
Validate element 'Search Result Text Message' should contains text: 'Seats available!'

assert expected **[

, 3 more... ]** to contain text **Seats available!**
And I should see "Call now on 0800 MARSAIR to book!" message
Validate element 'Search Result Text Message' should contains text: 'Call now on 0800 MARSAIR to book!'

assert expected **[

, 3 more... ]** to contain text **Call now on 0800 MARSAIR to book!**
And I should see valid message for promotion code "BC1-HGY-966" with "10" discount
Validate element 'Valid Promotion Code Text Message' should contains text: 'Promotional code BC1-HGY-966 used: 10% discount!'

assert expected **[

, 3 more... ]** to contain text **Promotional code BC1-HGY-966 used: 10% discount!**, but the text was **Seats available!Sorry, code BC1-HGY-966 is not validCall now on 0800 MARSAIR to book! Back**
